title: No search result are showing for the Word and Emenent Scope contraints when Fragment scope = properties .
description:
Build : 01/18

1. Create a db name fragment1
2. Now load 3 doc to collection 1 using browser drop box collector
3. Load 3 doc to no collection
4. Added the preoprties element City and Number to each file using eg :
 
xdmp:document-set-property("/content/C/Users/gghai/SVN_HOME/b6_0/qa/testdata/6.0/AppBuilderv2/collection1/bmfobi4hxjqn6dpt.xml",
  (<City>F</City>,
  <Number>6</Number>
   ))
 
PS : Go ahead and explore the "fragment1 " db on http://gghai:8000 m/c
    
4. Now Added the range index for
 
a) Index: message/@date
b) Index: message/@list
c) Index: City
d) Index: Number
 
5. Added the Properties Scope named :Pop1
 
6. Added one collection for "c"
 
7. Added the Elment Scope on Node=Number naed n"number1"
 
8. Added the value scope on City named "ValueCity"
 
9. Added the Word Scope for "WordCity"
 
10. Added the Word Scope for to/@address named "addressword"
 
11.Added the Elment Scope for to named "toelementscope"
 
12 IMP : All the elemnt stated above pOint 4 , 5 , 7 , 8 , 9 have Fragment Scope set to "Properties"
 
13. Element State in p[oint 10 and 11 are set to Documents
 
14 . Deploy the app
 
15. Do a search using Elemnt Scope and Word i.e Point 7 and Point 9 set to Fragment Scope = Properties
 
 
Actual Result : No serach result are showing for the Word and Emenent Scope contraints when Fragment scope = properties .
 
Please feel free to get in touch if you have bany questions.
 
Thanks
-Gaurav
